# **Heritability details**

## B cell

```{r echo=FALSE}
sum <- read.table("/project2/xinhe/xsun/website/factor_analysis/output/B_cell_hsq_processed.txt",header = T)
sum <- sum[,-6]
DT::datatable(sum, options = list(pageLength =5))
```

# **Factor GWAS**

For the factors have heritability p-value <0.05, we did GWAS association tests. 

## Summary table

The table below lists the factors have genomewide significant associations (not in MHC area).


| cell_type       | factor     | pwy_name                                    | pwy_code | pwy_gene | top_SNP                        | chr_topSNP | bp_topSNP | gwas_p_topSNP | nearby_genes_topSNP   |
|-----------------|------------|---------------------------------------------|----------|----------|--------------------------------|------------|-----------|---------------|-----------------------|
| CD14+ monocyte  | pwy71_pc3  | Riboflavin metabolism                       | 00740    | 6        | rs1401008965(19:11694826:TA:T) | 19         | 11694826  | 4.85E-10      | ACP5,ZNF627           |
| CD4+ T cell     | pwy7_pc4   | Ascorbate and aldarate metabolism           | 00053    | 8        | rs4505015                      | 10         | 125997171 | 1.55E-08      | OAT                   |
|                 | pwy72_pc3  | Vitamin B6 metabolism                       | 00750    | 5        | rs758463                       | 2          | 170437019 | 1.41E-17      | PPIG,FASTKD1          |
| CD8+ T cell     | pwy21_pc3  | Alanine, aspartate and glutamate metabolism | 00250    | 15       | rs73355374                     | 10         | 122724991 | 1.52E-09      | MIR5694               |
|                 | pwy113_pc3 | Ras signaling pathway                       | 04014    | 119      | rs144991212(19:32613277:T:C)   | 19         | 32613277  | 7.61E-09      | LOC101927411          |
|                 | pwy149_pc2 | Ferroptosis                                 | 04216    | 33       | rs144513905(15:80037422:T:G)   | 15         | 80037422  | 2.85E-08      | MTHFS,ST20-MTHFS,ST20 |
|                 | pwy276_pc4 | Chagas disease                              | 05142    | 64       | rs11204230                     | 10         | 48478267  | 2.38E-08      | GDF10                 |
|                 | pwy332_pc3 | Fluid shear stress and atherosclerosis      | 05418    | 90       | rs112600929(12:43163810:T:C)   | 12         | 43163810  | 1.251E-08     | LOC101927058          |
